text: (Īsā ni kansuru) shinjitsu no chishiki ga anata ni kudasa reta nochi, mo shikare ni tsuite anata to giron suru mono ga areba, itte yaru ga ī. `Sā, watashi-tachi no shison to anata gata no shison, watashi-tachi no tsuma-tachi to anata gata no tsuma-tachi, watashi-tachi to anata gata o issho ni yonde, arrā no o ikari ga uso-tsuki-sha no ue ni kudaru yō ni inorou
